labels.The Electronic Products Recycling Associ: The Electronic Products Recycling Association (EPRA) is an industry-led, not-for-profit organization that operates regulated recycling programs across Canada. They ensure that end-of-life electronics are handled in a safe, secure and environmentally-sound manner. Please refer to the following links for more information about the recycling program and EWR fees in the province you are shipping to.
labels.Alberta (operated by Alberta Recycling M: Alberta (operated by Alberta Recycling Management Authority)
